name: WordPress Wishlist
author: PluginRox

sections.description:
Manage and create unlimited list and add items on list. Item can be any WordPress Post type, can be any Taxonomy even any other custom text with a title along with description.

Try Demo

    Username: wpwl
    Password: pluginrox

Plugin Features

  • Frontent list creation
  • Instantly create and add item to list
  • Support any post type and taxonomy
  • Can store any custom text with a description and use this as a to-do management
  • Developer friendly
sections.installation:
1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your plugin setting via WordPress Dashboard and find “WordPress Wishlist” activate it.
sections.faq:
Does this Plugin support templating?

Yes, This plugin completely supports templating on any theme
